Veamos las distribuciones de cada variable num√©rica:

### Danceability

```{r}
get_collection_fields <- function(collection_name, field_name) {
  collection <- get_collection(collection_name)
  projection <- paste('{ "', field_name, '": 1 }', sep='')
  collection$find(fields = projection)
}

result <- get_collection_fields('track_features_top_1', 'danceability')
```

```{r fig1, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 9, fig.align = "center", include = TRUE}
p <- gplot_hist(result$danceability, name="Indice de Vailabilidad", binwidth=0.06)
ggplotly(p)
```
